channel.title: Posts on Jesse Molina
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jesse Molina

item.title: Go vs Rust: Why I chose Go... for now
item.description: Introduction In late 2022, I put together my roadmap for projects to tackle in 2023, many of which revolved around Go and high performance development. I had spent a good part of the year in tutorial hell, teaching myself how to build distributed systems in Go.

item.title: Terraform Quickstart
item.description: Terraform is an open-source tool that allows cloud provider APIs to be expressed as declarative configuration files, enabling Infrastructure-as-Code. In layman's terms, rather than manually creating resources on Azure, AWS, GCP, etc.

item.title: Hugo Static Website on GitHub Pages
item.description: If you have a need to build and host a static website, consider using GitHub Pages to host and Hugo to generate the site. GitHub pages is a static site hosting service made available for free by GitHub.
